issue.title: No shadows and sun light with non-Nvidia GPUs

content.raw:
This issue is already mentioned here:

[#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2083/point-and-spot-lights-dont-cast-shadows](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2083/point-and-spot-lights-dont-cast-shadows)

But still no progress since 2016. The main Gazebo developer will busy with ignition and I predict this issue will never be solved even until last Gazebo EOL in 2025. My advice is don’t be poor and buy computer with NVIDIA card.
